## Description
Brief description of the changes made to the API specification.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Specification enhancement

<!-- Provide a detailed list of changes -->

- [ ] Added new endpoint: (specify path and method)

- [ ] Enhanced documentation: (specify what was improved)
- [ ] Fixed validation issues: (specify what was fixed)

## API Specification Details
### Endpoints Modified/Added
- **Path**: `/api/v1/your-endpoint`
- **Method**: GET/POST/PUT/DELETE
- **Description**: Brief description of what this endpoint does

### Schema Changes
- **Schema Name**: (e.g., AssetSummary, SensorReading)
- **Changes**: (added fields, modified types, etc.)

## Testing Checklist
- [ ] OpenAPI specification validates successfully
- [ ] All examples are accurate and complete
- [ ] Response schemas are well-defined
- [ ] Parameter validation rules are appropriate
- [ ] Documentation renders correctly
- [ ] No breaking changes (or breaking changes are documented)

## Integration Impact
- [ ] Salesforce Field Service compatibility maintained
- [ ] Maximo integration considerations addressed
- [ ] SCADA system compatibility maintained
- [ ] MuleSoft Anypoint Platform compatibility verified
- [ ] No impact on existing consumers

- [ ] README.md updated (if applicable)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated with new version
- [ ] Deployment guide updated (if needed)
- [ ] Examples updated or added
